Articles.Content: i recently installed AVP but for some reason instead of getting a nice sporadic cloud layer like i've seen in videos the entirety of kerbin is covered in clouds. is there a config setting i need to alter or an extra from the instal pack i need to use?
Did you try the "Wispy Mid-Res Alternative" volumetric clouds on the 2nd step? Suggest you go back and try that one instead.
